about_the_game:
High-Resolution Opening/Ending Theme EP for Grisaia Phantom Trigger.
The tracks are available in both FLAC and WAV formats.


1. Edge Of My World
Vocals: Marina Kawano
Composition & Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)
Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

2. A Simple Wish
Vocals：Hiromi Sato
Lyrics ：Yoshikazu Kuwashima
Composition：Noriyasu Agematsu (Elements Garden)
Arrangement ：Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)


Note:
You need a device which supports High-Resolution audio in order to properly play back these audio files.


FLAC:96kHz 24bit
WAV:96kHz 24bit
